channel.title: Zenith client source cache
channel.description:
i take no credit what so ever for this i just wanted to revamp links [spoiler][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rvzkzm.png[/img][/spoiler] [spoiler]Client https://mega.co.nz/#!OhJxwAba!Xk33Bkx-myP11vCFwTob70UyALRLavY0-F7NjswyH3o
source & cache https://mega.co.nz/#!vlQx0KbJ!VmSWszRXW_v0IfpYLPvUi1dXriZycVZRopVLsBQyz5s[/spoiler]
[spoiler]Now for the info :) hope you enjoy MY SOURCE
Credits: Matrix Team PDF team for the 562 SPB system RsCalifornia and Devs All my staff and players Dragonkk/Alex <<< hes a boss, a true legend! Lost Soul Team <<< took some stuff from them Whoever released the 721 cache Timers3 for teaching me to realize trust is a valuable thing! -.- Ummm, and some people for snippets i dont remember names though. Tyden, i guess he was to maker of the 562 GE (Never knew, kinda cool to learn somethign today :P)
Things it has: QBD KBD Kalph PlayersOnline if you can make php and sql injection Highscores added Skills all working Dungeoneeering with an Entity Leak, easy fix just make it remove the dungeon npcs when dungeon is over. GE without the sell as Timers has pointed out. Its one Config, configbyfile to be excact but i cbf'd to go through trying to get it rite now. Custom Polypore as i couldnt get the XTEAS Full Jadinko Lair Corp Nex Godwars Full Barrows Glacors Bork Dag Kings Jad Warriors Guild Duel Custom Hararken boss Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Prestige System just gotta readd interface. Vote System with 3 different kind of rewards and Epic Vote store NEWEST Items of RS like Dragonbane armor Flamming Skull etc. Tons of pets in-game <<<<< MY custom way of doing it Working Dungeoneering, Hunter, Summoning. Chaotics Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots ::cmd to open up commands page.
And as stated in credits the SPB system from 562 converted to work in this, i did that to easily add the GE Yes ima noob for doing that but its cool :P you can rip stuff from any of your old 562 projects if you need to :P
PICS GE From ad thread!
Jadinko from ad thread!
Polypore from ad thread!
QBD from ad thread, i made it before the xteas were released.
Custom vote point store that goes off of points rather than tokens so it doesnt take up space. Dung works the same way.
Armour slots correctly fitted none of this wierd stuff :P
One of the many pets, vulture!
Dung shop, works with internall points rather than tokens. i just used the dung gold as a item to be displayed in box.
The command central to show commands to players
Where the custom kiln is.
Use your firecape on the floating orb to initiate har arken.
HarArken, tentacles will spawn at random around you and start attackign you.
Summoning interface lites up when your pouch can be made.
Pouch gets made when you click it.
Custom farming where it has timers and stuff, i started on playeronly world objects for it but never finished.
Then after picking the allotment or herb you get a random amount of that item 1-3 and exp
The new cache, shark fists and olympic clothing.[/spoiler]

@calem wrote:

i take no credit what so ever for this i just wanted to revamp links
[spoiler][/spoiler]

source & cache https://mega.co.nz/#!vlQx0KbJ!VmSWszRXW_v0IfpYLPvUi1dXriZycVZRopVLsBQyz5s[/spoiler]

[spoiler]Now for the info hope you enjoy MY SOURCE

Credits:
Matrix Team
PDF team for the 562 SPB system
RsCalifornia and Devs
All my staff and players
Dragonkk/Alex <<< hes a boss, a true legend!
Lost Soul Team <<< took some stuff from them
Whoever released the 721 cache
Timers3 for teaching me to realize trust is a valuable thing! -.-
Ummm, and some people for snippets i dont remember names though.
Tyden, i guess he was to maker of the 562 GE (Never knew, kinda cool to learn somethign today :P)

Things it has:
QBD
KBD
Kalph
PlayersOnline if you can make php and sql injection
Highscores added
Skills all working
Dungeoneeering with an Entity Leak, easy fix just make it remove the dungeon npcs when dungeon is over.
GE without the sell as Timers has pointed out. Its one Config, configbyfile to be excact but i cbfâ€™d to go through trying to get it rite now.
Custom Polypore as i couldnt get the XTEAS
Full Jadinko Lair
Corp
Nex
Godwars
Full Barrows
Glacors
Bork
Dag Kings
Jad
Warriors Guild
Duel
Custom Hararken boss
Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk
Mage Bank
Fight Pits
West Pk
East Pk
Edgeville
Prestige System just gotta readd interface.
Vote System with 3 different kind of rewards and Epic Vote store
NEWEST Items of RS like Dragonbane armor Flamming Skull etc.
Tons of pets in-game <<<<< MY custom way of doing it
Working Dungeoneering, Hunter, Summoning.
Chaotics
Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots
::cmd to open up commands page.

And as stated in credits the SPB system from 562 converted to work in this, i did that to easily add the GE Yes ima noob for doing that but its cool you can rip stuff from any of your old 562 projects if you need to

GE From ad thread!

Jadinko from ad thread!

Polypore from ad thread!

QBD from ad thread, i made it before the xteas were released.

Custom vote point store that goes off of points rather than tokens so it doesnt take up space. Dung works the same way.

Armour slots correctly fitted none of this wierd stuff

One of the many pets, vulture!

Dung shop, works with internall points rather than tokens. i just used the dung gold as a item to be displayed in box.

The command central to show commands to players

Where the custom kiln is.

Use your firecape on the floating orb to initiate har arken.

HarArken, tentacles will spawn at random around you and start attackign you.

Summoning interface lites up when your pouch can be made.

Pouch gets made when you click it.

Custom farming where it has timers and stuff, i started on playeronly world objects for it but never finished.

Then after picking the allotment or herb you get a random amount of that item 1-3 and exp

The new cache, shark fists and olympic clothing.[/spoiler]
